title: The Week of Frank Morris: The Reluctant Hero
summary: Frank Morris, a hobbyist coach, unexpectedly gains superpowers and faces the dilemma of using them responsibly while maintaining his passion for mentoring.
summaryGerman: Frank Morris, ein Hobbytrainer, bekommt unerwartet Superkräfte und steht vor dem Dilemma, diese verantwortungsbewusst einzusetzen, während er seine Leidenschaft für das Mentoring beibehält.
summaryDutch: Frank Morris, een hobbycoach, krijgt onverwacht superkrachten en staat voor het dilemma om deze verantwoord te gebruiken terwijl hij zijn passie voor mentoring voortzet.
summaryFrench: Frank Morris, un entraîneur passionné, obtient des super-pouvoirs de manière inattendue et fait face au dilemme de les utiliser de manière responsable tout en maintenant sa passion pour le mentorat.

story.text: Frank discovers he can manipulate time after a mysterious storm during his morning jog.
Testing his powers, Frank accidentally freezes time at a local basketball game, sparking both confusion and awe.
Frank uses his power to avert a potential accident, saving a child and feeling the weight of his new responsibilities.
Struggling with the moral implications, Frank seeks advice from an old mentor, finding solace but no clear answers.
Embracing his role, Frank starts using his abilities to secretly help his community, improving local events and activities.
News of a mysterious 'guardian' begins to circulate, as Frank's efforts have not gone unnoticed.
Frank reflects on his week, realizing that he can balance his life and his powers, focusing on being both a mentor and a hero.

ending: And so, Frank Morris embraced his dual role, learning that true heroism comes in many forms.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and even the smallest acts can make a big difference.
